scripts.build-all: npm run build && npx tsc --project ../jul-language-server/tsconfig.json && npx tsc --project ../vscode-jul-language-service/tsconfig.json
scripts.build-all-and-deploy: npm run build-all && npm run install-cli && npm run test-deploy --prefix ../vscode-jul-language-service
scripts.test: tsc -p tsconfig.test.json && copyfiles --flat src/core-lib.jul test && mocha 'test-setup.mjs' 'test/**/*.test.js'
